title: "Unspecfied error" while trying to reinstall the client
body:
After taking a break from league I decided to re download it, but whenever I try, I always get a pop-up saying "Unspecified error refer to LOGS for more information". I have been trying to download league for the past two days now... I have searched up and tried many different "solutions"(properly reinstalling league, having ccleaner delete all temporary files and tried using a vpn) that worked for others but nothing is working but none of it is working for me. The furthest I have gotten is 45% before the message popped up.

This is the error I have found in the LOGS:

Patcher Logs>LoLPatcherUx:

000004.009| ALWAYS| We encountered an error with the champion rotation data (http://127.0.0.1:62601/static/bundle-client-hub/js/app/main.js:286)

This is the only error I encounter when I look through the logs and use the Find Function(CTRL+F) and type "error".

replies.body: At 45% your patcher has reached out to the patching servers to download and write updates.  A slow or bad connection is blocking that from happening, and resulting in that error.  You'll want to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to get back in -game!  Welcome back, and let me know if you have any questions!
